summary: A failed business deal forces James Nevill to blackmail his weak-willed friend into murdering him so that his wife can collect his insurance, but circumstances suddenly change.
cast: Dane Clark|Cecile Chevreau|Paul Carpenter|Thea Gregory|Anthony Forwood|Arthur Young|Howard Marion-Crawford|Arnold Diamond|Peter Gawthorne|Charles Hawtrey|Ross Hutchinson|Martin Lawrence|Warren Mitchell|Hugo Schuster|Avis Scott|Geoffrey Sumner|Larry Taylor|Leslie Wright
keywords: business deal|blackmail|british noir|trafalgar square london|london england
title: Five Days
